about_the_game:
Ever gone somewhere and thought "Something's Not Right"?

The Loop

You are thrown into a new environment and it is up to you to decide whether there is something wrong. You must carefully examine the world around you to remember exactly what is where and who is doing what. You will then be thrown back into the same world, it may be exactly the same, or it may be completely different, it is up to you to decide.

The Club

A carefully crafted experience at a Tokyo based club. Get in and amongst the party goers and remember exactly and and who is there. Things may be a little different the next time that you go in.

The Graveyard

Spooky things happen in the graveyard, spooky and scary things. Then again, nothing might happen. It is up to you to decide whether everything is fine or if that zombie rising from the grave is probably not meant to be there. Experience over 50 alterations.

More Coming Soon

At launch there will be a total of five (5) levels available to play, each with up to 100 alterations to challenge your detective skills. More information will up updated as it develops.

Core Features:

  • Investigate your environment, experience over 500 strange occurrences and changes.
  • A fully narrated experience offering a different experience each time you play.
  • Five (5) hand crafted environments to experience.

name: Something's Not Right

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB

short_description: Ever gone somewhere and thought "Something's Not Right"? Explore, investigate and experience an ever changing environment. Enter the world and decide if everything is the same or whether something is different. Make your choice carfefully as it may be the last decision you ever make.
